content.rendered:
No matter what type of air conditioning system you’re looking into,  Quality Refrigeration Services has the tools and expertise to get the job done right. We offer a full range of products and installation services to customers and we can accommodate orders for all types of systems, large and small. When you hire us for air conditioning installation, you can be confident you’re getting the best in the business.

Our AC Installation Services – Air Conditioning Installation Baltimore MD

Whether you’re a homeowner looking to put air conditioning in a new addition or add it to a home that’s simply never had AC, we have the skills, experience and manpower you’re looking for. Our technicians have extensive experience working with a wide variety of air conditioning systems, so no matter what brand or type of air conditioner you choose, you can rest assured that we’ll have it installed in the right way as quickly as possible.

We firmly believe that no matter how high–quality the air conditioning system you purchase, it will only serve you well if its installation is carried out properly. That’s why we make sure that all of our customers receive the same high level of attention to detail from start to finish. We’ll check and recheck our work to ensure that everything is working exactly as it should be. When you handle your AC installation project, you know you’re getting the best possible installers in the business.

Our Air Conditioning Products

When it comes to air conditioning installation Baltimore MD – We offer a wide range of air conditioning systems for you to choose from, so you’ll be sure to wind up with a system that meets your needs. The type of air conditioner that’s right for you will depend on quite a few factors including the size of your home and whether or not you already have ductwork in place. However, we have just the product for all contingencies and can help you sort through your options quickly and easily.

For cooling smaller spaces or if you want to be able to control multiple climate zones in your home separately, we offer ductless split and mini–split air conditioning systems. These don’t require ductwork to be installed, are very energy efficient and can be used for just one or two rooms or as a whole house solution. Ductless split air conditioners are rapidly gaining in popularity and something you should definitely take a closer look at before making your final decision.

However, for larger homes or those with ductwork already in place, we also offer more traditional packaged air conditioning systems. With these types of air conditioners, you’ll have an outdoor condenser unit to cool the air and an indoor air handler that manages the flow of chilled air throughout the house. We offer large central air conditioning units as well, which are appropriate for many larger, modern homes.

Proper Air Conditioner Sizing

It’s extremely important that before you proceed with air conditioning system installation you make sure that the system you’ve chosen is the right size for your home. If the area to be cooled is too great for your air conditioner, the system probably won’t be able to maintain a comfortable indoor temperature consistently.

On the other hand, if your air conditioning system is too big for your home, it will cause extra wear and tear on the unit as it’s forced to switch on and off constantly to maintain your desired temperature. In both of these situations, you’re likely to wind up with a much higher energy bill than necessary and won’t enjoy the comfort of a well cooled home.

Customers First – Air Conditioning Installation Baltimore MD

No matter what type of air conditioning system you need installed in your home, you’ll find what you’re looking for. So don’t hesitate to give us a call today. We’re always happy to answer your questions and help you find just the right air conditioning system for you and your family.

We are here to help with your air conditioning installation in Baltimore MD and surrounding areas.
